Fales Library and Special Collections
Second Aeon Archive
Second Aeon Publications
MSS.023
6.75 Linear Feet (14 boxes)
1967-1974 The Second Aeon Archive is comprised of all the correspondence and manuscript material that created Second Aeon's issues, such as: magazine layouts, page proofs, letters to the editor, illustration layouts, and original manuscripts.
Provenance
The Second Aeon Archive was acquired via purchase from Richard Aaron of Am Here Books, in 1974. The Second Aeon Archive is part of the Avant Garde Collection, collected at Fales Library during the 1960's and 70's by Mel Edelstein and Theodore Grieder.
Access Restrictions
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Use Restrictions
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); Second Aeon Archive; MSS 023; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
Historical Note
Twenty-one issues of the magazine Second Aeon appeared between 1967 and 1974. It was published in Cardiff, Wales, with the support of the Welsh Arts Council and edited by Peter Finch. Containing poetry, short stories, cartoons, and illustrations, Second Aeon for it's period, was a comprehensive round up of the UK's small press activity. Noted contributors to the magazine included: Robert Bly, Gary Snyder, Allen Ginsberg, LeRoi Jones, Pablo Neruda, Charles Bukowski, Lorca, Octavio Paz, and countless others. In conjunction with the magazine, Second Aeon was also a small press that published poetry anthologies and books.
Scope and Content Note
The Second Aeon Archive is comprised of all the correspondence and manuscript material that created Second Aeon's issues, such as: magazine layouts, page proofs, letters to the editor, illustration layouts, and original manuscripts. Noted correspondents include Paul Auster, Carol Berg, Robert Bly, Charles Bukowski, William Burroughs, John Cage, Cyril Hodges, Alison Knowles, Jim Morrison, Jeff Nuttall, and Peter Redgrove. Also included in this collection are manuscripts used by Second Aeon's small press to publish various poetry books and anthologies.
Arrangement
Series I and III are arranged alphabetically and series 2 is arranged chronologically.
The collection is divided into three series: I) Correspondence to Peter Finch, editor II) Editorial Correspondence, 1967-1974, and III) Manuscripts.
Missing Title
Series I: Correspondence to Peter Finch, editor
Series II: Editorial Correspondence, 1967-1974
Series III, Subseries A: Manuscripts for Magazine Second Aeon
Series III, Subseries B: Manuscripts for Second Aeon's Small Press

Series I: Correspondence to Peter Finch, editor
Scope and Contents note
Series I contains six boxes of correspondence to Peter Finch concerning the magazine Second Aeon. Scope and Contents note
Series II contains four boxes of correspondence to Peter Finch pertaining to editorial concerns of the magazines uch as: subscription requests, poetry admissions, thank you/congratulatory notes, and other such solicitations. This series also includes Peter Finch's personal correspondence comprising a copybook and letters dealing with his career as a poet.Correspondence from: A-Z196771Correspondence from: A-Z196872Correspondence from:A-K196973Correspondence L-Z196974Correspondence: A-L197075Correspondence: M-Z197076Correspondence: A-L197181Correspondence from: M-Z197182Correspondence from: A-C197283Correspondence D-G:197284Correspondence H-M:197285Correspondence N-Z:197291Correspondence A-C:197392Correspondence D-N:197393Correspondence O-Z:197394Correspondence A-M:197495Correspondence N-Z:197496Correspondence : Undated, A-G1972-1974101Correspondence : Undated, H-R1972-1974102Correspondence : Undated, S-Z1972-1974103Correspondence from: Finch, Peter1967104Correspondence : Personal: A-D105Correspondence : Personal, E-S106Correspondence : Personal, T-Z107Correspondence : Personal, Unidentified108Correspondence : Pink Peace109Series III: Subseries A: Manuscripts for magazine Second AeonArchive lists and inventory111Advertising brochures112Issue no. 1113Manuscript materials: Issues No. 8 and 9114Manuscript materials: Issue No. 11115Manuscript materials: Issue No. 12116Manuscript materials: Isue No. 13117Manucript materials: Issue No. 14118Manuscript materials: Issue No. 15119Page proofs: Issue No. 151110Manuscript materials: Issues No. 16 and 171111Page proofs: Issues No. 16 and 171112Illustration Mockups: Issue No. 16?1113Cover Mockup: Issue No. 18121Manuscript materials: Issue No. 18122Page proofs: Issue No. 18123Mockup: Issue No. 18124Manuscript: Issues Nos. 19-21125Manuscript: Issues Nos. 19-21126Visuals: Issues Nos. 19-21127Unpublished manuscripts128Unpublished unsigned manuscripts129Series III: Subseries B: Manuscripts for Second Aeon's small pressManuscript and correspondence, book section: Bantock, Gavin131Manuscript and correspondence, book section: Blazek, Douglas;
